meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>topic</kanji> that we are <kanji>talk</kanji>ing about is the <vocabulary>topic</vocabulary> that we are talking about. It's the <vocabulary>subject</vocabulary> of our conversation.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
